Job Description: As a Developer you will:     Understand the complexities of various UI technologies on web, Windows, Java, Android, iOS etc.   Explore, experiment and build ways to automate manipulation of such user interfaces.  Program in multiple languages to achieve automation  Help the support team in resolving critical customer issues  Work in a open, non-hierarchical, relaxed yet focused environment  Be exposed to various new frameworks and technologies in web, mobile and desktop     Ideally, you should have:      Excellent analytical skills  Proficiency in Java and Javascript.  Experience in writing good object oriented code along with unit tests.  Exposure to other languages and technologies like C#, Ruby, Android, iOS, AWS cloud, VMWare etc. is a plus.  Experience with Eclipse, Git, Jenkins, build systems, deployment on VMsCloud.  Knowledge of web applications and client server architectures.  Good English communication skills  Strong determination, Can Do attitude, strong sense of ownership, and a passion for work  1-3 years of programming experience with good exposure to software development life cycle.     What happens in our interviews:      You will need to pass an aptitude test  Answer programming questions in Java (or any other language)
